Blancett Price List and Literature Updates
New Blancett Price List - No price changes. There was a correction made on page 32 for explosion proof B2800 flow monitors, part number B28SBX. For the units of measure designation, the Barrels code was changed from HM to EM and the Liters code was changed from EM to HM. Other Blancett documentation updates

Concrete Flow Meters Price List Update
A new price list for concrete water batching systems and admixture dispenser products is now available for download on the extranet. There are no price changes. A correction made to a minor pricing discrepancy for Part WCM250256, scaler board only.
NEW Guide to Common Valve Terminology
It can sometimes be challenging to remember the many technical terms used in different industries and technologies, such as the terminology used to describe process control valves. Terms like "bonnet" may be unfamiliar to those new to an industry or technology.
To assist you in the field, we've create a new document, which provides definitions and explanations of common terminology related to control valves and liquid process systems. The new glossary is available for download on the Research ControlÂ® Valves page on the Badger Meter website.

New Training Material on the Extranet
We have recently added both newly created and updated training PowerPoint presentations to the extranet. These presentations are meant for you to use for your own reference or to conduct your own customer education in the field. The files may be downloaded and tailored to fit your needs depending on your audience.
